original_text: God chose what is low and despised in the world, even things that are not, to bring to nothing things that are,
korean_text: 하나님께서 세상의 천한 것들과 멸시 받는 것들과 없는 것들을 택하사 있는 것들을 폐하려 하시나니

sentences.original_text: God chose what is low and despised in the world,
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 세상에서 낮고 멸시받는 것들을 택하셨으니,

sentences.original_text: to bring to nothing things that are,
